page.title: 14ARTS AND CRAFTS WEST FLEGG
page.content: Mrs Pacey has a very interesting hobby.It is potting she makes pots, vases,and ornaments.She has a kilm. Mr Evans is an old man who makes a small amount of money by sharping shears & lawn mower blades. Mrs Cottold spins.She buys fleece & spins it into jumpers & clothes which she sells.This is not her job but just her hobby. Mrs Daniels hobby is painting.she paints as a job & her workhouse gallery is in the old farm house grounds. Mr Evans has another country craft which is making things out of straw.He is very skilled at it & he wins lots of prizes. Miss Bates does flower arranging & wins many awards.Her garden is very colourful & has many differenrent flowers.
